q: "There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there," Aaron Rodgers said to wild applause. David Letterman asked Aaron Rodgers why he was not recruited out of high school to a major college. I think a number of reasons: one, I wasn't, you know- even today, I'm not gon na be the guy who pops out as- you know, I'm not 6-5, I'm not 240, I don't run a 4.5 40. But I think a lot of times, the things you can't measure are often the things that give people the most success, Aaron Rodgers said.
